disease: Malignant neoplasm of connective and soft tissue of unspecified upper limb, including shoulder

symptoms.name: Pain
symptoms.pattern: May be present or absent; can range from mild to severe

symptoms.name: Mass
symptoms.pattern: Palpable lump or swelling in the affected area

symptoms.name: Weakness
symptoms.pattern: Muscle weakness in the affected limb

vital_signs.heart_rate: May be elevated in some cases due to pain or stress
vital_signs.blood_pressure: May be elevated in some cases due to pain or stress
vital_signs.respiratory_rate: Usually normal unless there are complications

imaging_findings.X-ray: May show bone destruction or soft tissue mass
imaging_findings.CT scan: Provides detailed images of the mass and surrounding tissues
imaging_findings.MRI: Provides detailed images of the soft tissues, including muscles, ligaments, and tendons
imaging_findings.PET scan: May be used to detect metastasis

required: Clinical findings suggestive of a soft tissue mass in the upper limb
Imaging findings consistent with a malignant neoplasm
supportive: Biopsy confirming the diagnosis of malignancy
